Class Copy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Copy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Copy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that creates a copy object for a resource

    1.0
    Author:
    Boris Andreev and Kyriacos Mosphilis

      • setBorrowHistory

        public void setBorrowHistory()

      • requestCopy

        public void requestCopy(User user)
        Method which allows the user to request a copy which then needs to be approved by a librarian. Sets isRequested variable to true and sets the dateRequested to the date now. Also stores which user currently has the copy.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who has requested the item

      • checkCopy

        public static Copy checkCopy(Resource item)
        Method that goes through all copies to check if there is a free one for a user to request.
        Parameters:
        item - The resource for which the user checks if there is a free copy.
        Returns:
        Null if there are no free copies and the Copy object which is free if there is one.

      • getIsReserved

        public boolean getIsReserved()
        Getter method of isReserved variable.
        Returns:
        true if the copy is reserved for someone else, otherwise false.
